0.2.0.en:

Add vacuum online status and deviceInfo
Add support for Camera of MaxV models
Add support for titles of obstacles
Make options a little prettier
Add support to check for new firmware
Add Support for Roborock S8, S8 Pro Ultra, S4 Max, Q7, S7 Max Ultra
Loads of bug fixes
Add option to sniff traffic via mitmproxy
